styles={container:{maxWidth:'1200px',margin:'0 auto',padding:'2rem'},title:{color:'#2c3e50',textAlign:'center',marginBottom:'2rem'},filters:{marginBottom:'2rem'},categories:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',gap:'1rem',marginBottom:'1rem',flexWrap:'wrap'},categoryButton:{padding:'0.5rem ease'},searchBar:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',marginTop:'1rem'},searchInput:{width:'100%',maxWidth:'500px',padding:'0.8rem',fontSize:'1rem',border:'1px solid #ddd',borderRadius:'4px',outline:'none'},grid:{display:'grid',gridTemplateColumns:'repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr))',gap:'2rem',padding:'1rem'},recipeCard:{backgroundColor:'white',borderRadius:'12px',overflow:'hidden',boxShadow:'0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',cursor:'pointer',transition:'transform 0.2s','&:hover':{transform:'translateY(-5px)'}},recipeImage:{width:'100%',height:'200px',objectFit:'cover'},recipeContent:{padding:'1rem'},recipeTitle:{margin:'0 0 0.5rem 0',color:'#2c3e50'},recipeDescription:{margin:'0 0 1rem 0',color:'#666',fontSize:'0.9rem'},recipeMeta:{display:'flex',gap:'0.5rem'},recipeBadge:{backgroundColor:'#f0f0f0',padding:'0.3rem sourcesContent:
// src/components/recipe/RecipeList.js
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';

          cookingTime: "15 dakika",
          difficulty: "Kolay",
          category: "Mezeler",
          ingredients: ["500 gr süzme yoğurt", "2 diş sarımsak", "Nane", "Dereotu", "Zeytinyağı"]
        },
        {
          id: 50,
          title: "Şakşuka",
          description: "Kızartılmış sebzelerle yapılan meze",
          imageUrl: getRecipeImage("Şakşuka", "Mezeler"),
          cookingTime: "45 dakika",
          difficulty: "Orta",
          category: "Mezeler",
          ingredients: ["3 adet patlıcan", "3 adet biber", "3 adet domates", "3 diş sarımsak", "Zeytinyağı"]
        },
          // İÇECEKLER (5 tarif)
  {
    id: 51,
    title: "Türk Kahvesi",
    description: "Geleneksel Türk kahvesi",
    imageUrl: getRecipeImage("Türk Kahvesi", "İçecekler"),
    cookingTime: "5 dakika",
    difficulty: "Kolay",
    category: "İçecekler",
    ingredients: ["2 kahve ölçeği Türk kahvesi", "2 fincan su", "İsteğe göre şeker"]
  },
  {
    id: 52,
    title: "Ayran",
    description: "Geleneksel Türk içeceği",
    imageUrl: getRecipeImage("Ayran", "İçecekler"),
    cookingTime: "5 dakika",
    difficulty: "Kolay",
    category: "İçecekler",
    ingredients: ["2 su bardağı yoğurt", "2 su bardağı su", "Tuz"]
  },
  {
    id: 53,
    title: "Şalgam Suyu",
    description: "Fermente mor havuç suyu",
    imageUrl: getRecipeImage("Şalgam Suyu", "İçecekler"),
    cookingTime: "7 gün",
    difficulty: "Zor",
    category: "İçecekler",
    ingredients: ["1 kg mor havuç", "Bulgur", "Kara turp", "Tuz", "Su"]
  },
  {
    id: 54,
    title: "Boza",
    description: "Geleneksel Türk kış içeceği",
    imageUrl: getRecipeImage("Boza", "İçecekler"),
    cookingTime: "3 gün",
    difficulty: "Zor",
    category: "İçecekler",
    ingredients: ["500 gr darı", "Su", "Şeker", "Maya", "Tarçın"]
  },
  {
    id: 55,
    title: "Salep",
    description: "Sıcak süt ve salep tozu ile yapılan kış içeceği",
    imageUrl: getRecipeImage("Salep", "İçecekler"),
    cookingTime: "15 dakika",
    difficulty: "Kolay",
    category: "İçecekler",
    ingredients: ["2 yemek kaşığı salep tozu", "1 litre süt", "2 yemek kaşığı şeker", "Tarçın"]
  }
]);
        
  

  const filteredRecipes = recipes.filter(recipe => {
    const matchesSearch = recipe.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase());
    const matchesCategory = selectedCategory === 'Tümü' || recipe.category === selectedCategory;
    return matchesSearch && matchesCategory;
  });

  return (
    <div style={styles.container}>
      <h1 style={styles.title}>Tarifler</h1>
      
      <div style={styles.filters}>
        <div style={styles.categories}>
          {categories.map(category => (
            <button
              key={category}
              style={{
                ...styles.categoryButton,
                backgroundColor: selectedCategory === category ? '#2c3e50' : '#fff',
                color: selectedCategory === category ? '#fff' : '#2c3e50'
              }}
              onClick={() => setSelectedCategory(category)}
            >
              {category}
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div style={styles.searchBar}>
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Tarif ara..."
            style={styles.searchInput}
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
          />
        </div>
      </div>

      <div style={styles.grid}>
        {filteredRecipes.map(recipe => (
          <div 
            key={recipe.id} 
            style={styles.recipeCard}
            onClick={() => navigate(`/recipe/${recipe.id}`)}
          >
            <img src={recipe.imageUrl} alt={recipe.title} style={styles.recipeImage} />
            <div style={styles.recipeContent}>
              <h3 style={styles.recipeTitle}>{recipe.title}</h3>
              <p style={styles.recipeDescription}>{recipe.description}</p>
              <div style={styles.recipeMeta}>
                <span style={styles.recipeBadge}>{recipe.cookingTime}</span>
                <span style={styles.recipeBadge}>{recipe.difficulty}</span>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        ))}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

const styles = {
  container: {
    maxWidth: '1200px',
    margin: '0 auto',
    padding: '2rem'
  },
  title: {
    color: '#2c3e50',
    textAlign: 'center',
    marginBottom: '2rem'
  },
  filters: {
    marginBottom: '2rem'
  },
  categories: {
    display: 'flex',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    gap: '1rem',
    marginBottom: '1rem',
    flexWrap: 'wrap'
  },
  categoryButton: {
    padding: '0.5rem 1rem',
    border: '2px solid #2c3e50',
    borderRadius: '20px',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontSize: '0.9rem',
    transition: 'all 0.3s ease'
  },
  searchBar: {
    display: 'flex',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    marginTop: '1rem'
  },
  searchInput: {
    width: '100%',
    maxWidth: '500px',
    padding: '0.8rem',
    fontSize: '1rem',
    border: '1px solid #ddd',
    borderRadius: '4px',
    outline: 'none'
  },
  grid: {
    display: 'grid',
    gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr))',
    gap: '2rem',
    padding: '1rem'
  },
  recipeCard: {
    backgroundColor: 'white',
    borderRadius: '12px',
    overflow: 'hidden',
    boxShadow: '0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    transition: 'transform 0.2s',
    '&:hover': {
      transform: 'translateY(-5px)'
    }
  },
  recipeImage: {
    width: '100%',
    height: '200px',
    objectFit: 'cover'
  },
  recipeContent: {
    padding: '1rem'
  },
  recipeTitle: {
    margin: '0 0 0.5rem 0',
    color: '#2c3e50'
  },
  recipeDescription: {
    margin: '0 0 1rem 0',
    color: '#666',
    fontSize: '0.9rem'
  },
  recipeMeta: {
    display: 'flex',
    gap: '0.5rem'
  },
  recipeBadge: {
    backgroundColor: '#f0f0f0',
    padding: '0.3rem 0.8rem',
    borderRadius: '12px',
    fontSize: '0.8rem',
    color: '#666'
  }
};

export default RecipeList;
